item.title: CLDefence
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Ok, I’ve been trying to make Dragon armour req 60 def, D’hide body req. 40def, while d’hide legs and vamps req. 1def…
So far all I’ve gotten is errors…
This is what I’ve worked with so far


			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("helm") || if (ItemName.endsWith("chainbody") || if (ItemName.endsWith("platelegs") || if (ItemName.endsWith("plateskirt") || if (ItemName.endsWith("shield")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("body")) {
				return 40;

And this is another one.


			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("helm")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("chainbody")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("shield")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("plateskirt")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("platelegs")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				if (ItemName.endsWith("body")) {
				return 40;

Whats wronge with them? [br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2007, 06:21:15 PM[/size][hr]Why won’t nobody help me
